name: astigmatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a fault in the lens of the eye that reduces the quality of sight, especially one that stops the eye from focusing (= being able to see a particular object clearly): Nearly all eyes are slightly astigmatic. I’m severely myopic and have an astigmatic defect in my right eye. See
astigmatism
More examplesFewer examplesHis left eye had always been seriously astigmatic.Astigmatic people are able to use a type of soft contact lens.If you are astigmatic, it may be possible to correct the problem with laser surgery.
